articles.title: Jonathan Bailey and David Corenswet get real about their ambition, auditions and the roles ahead

neutral.headline: Rising Stars Share Insights on Playing Iconic Characters
neutral.body:
In a recent interview, actors Jonathan Bailey and David Corenswet discussed their roles as Oz and Superman, respectively. Both actors reflected on the challenges and rewards of playing these beloved characters in popular productions. Bailey, known for his role in "Wicked: For Good," shared his thoughts on embodying the charming and complex character of Oz, while Corenswet, recognized for his portrayal of Superman, discussed the responsibility of bringing such an iconic superhero to life on screen.
Bailey and Corenswet expressed their gratitude for the opportunities to portray these iconic characters and the impact it has had on their careers. They both acknowledged the importance of staying true to the essence of the characters while also bringing their own interpretation and depth to the roles.
As 2025's rising stars, Bailey and Corenswet have captivated audiences with their performances and dedication to their craft. Their insights into playing these iconic characters offer a glimpse into the creative process and the passion they bring to their roles. As fans eagerly anticipate their future projects, Bailey and Corenswet's reflections on their experiences serve as a reminder of the magic of storytelling and the power of iconic characters in the entertainment industry.

conservative.headline: "A New Generation of Hollywood Heartthrobs: Embracing Traditional Values and American Icons
conservative.body:
In a world where Hollywood often strays from America's traditional values, rising stars David Corenswet and Jonathan Bailey are shining examples of talent and virtue on the big screen. Corenswet, known for his portrayal of the iconic Superman, embodies the strength and morality that have defined the superhero for generations. Bailey, with his role in 'Wicked: For Good,' showcases the timeless story of good triumphing over evil.
These two actors not only entertain audiences with their captivating performances but also serve as role models for the younger generation. By bringing to life beloved characters like Superman and Oz's charmer, they remind us of the enduring values that make America great.
In a time when our country faces challenges both at home and abroad, it is refreshing to see Hollywood embrace characters that embody the American spirit. Corenswet and Bailey's dedication to their craft and portrayal of these iconic figures are a testament to the power of storytelling and the importance of upholding traditional values.
As we look to the future, let us celebrate these rising stars who remind us of the timeless virtues that have made America a beacon of hope and inspiration for the world. Corenswet and Bailey are not just heartthrobs on the screen; they are beacons of light in a world that sometimes seems dark.

progressive.headline: Hollywood Heartthrobs Reflect on Role as Trumpian Figures in Pop Culture
progressive.body:
In a society deeply entrenched in political and social turmoil, the characters portrayed by actors like David Corenswet and Jonathan Bailey have taken on a new significance. Their roles as the charismatic charmers of Oz and Krypton now serve as eerie reflections of the Trumpian figures that have dominated our political landscape.
Corenswet, known for his portrayal of Superman, embodies the unbridled power and privilege that have come to define the current administration. Meanwhile, Bailey's character in 'Wicked: For Good' symbolizes the cunning and manipulation often associated with the political elites.
As these heartthrobs reflect on their roles, it is impossible to ignore the parallels between their fictional characters and the real-life figures that continue to shape our world. The charm and charisma that they exude on screen serve as a stark reminder of the dangers of unchecked power and influence.
In a time when truth is often overshadowed by flashy performances and empty promises, these actors play a crucial role in reminding us of the need for critical thinking and skepticism. As we navigate the complexities of our modern world, let us not be seduced by superficial charm, but instead, remain vigilant in the face of those who seek to manipulate and deceive.

articles.title: Scholar warns feminism has become a ‘megachurch’ replacing faith, family and Christian virtue

neutral.headline: Examining Feminism's Influence on Society
neutral.body:
In a new book, a Catholic author has explored the similarities between feminism and organized religion, drawing attention to the movement's structural and ideological parallels with Christianity. The author suggests that feminism operates as a "megachurch" in contemporary society, highlighting its significant influence and presence in shaping cultural norms and values.
Through a critical lens, the author delves into the religious-like aspects of feminism, pointing out the doctrines and belief systems that guide its followers. By analyzing the organizational structure and rituals within the feminist movement, the author raises thought-provoking questions about the role of feminism in shaping societal attitudes and behaviors.
This examination sheds light on the complexities of feminism as a social phenomenon, prompting readers to consider the impact of feminist ideologies on various aspects of public life. While some may view feminism as a progressive force for gender equality, others may see it as a divisive influence that challenges traditional values and beliefs.
Ultimately, the author's analysis invites readers to reflect on the profound influence of feminism in contemporary discourse and encourages a deeper understanding of its intricate relationship with religion and spirituality.

conservative.headline: Feminism's Dangerous Rise as a Secular "Megachurch" Threatens Traditional Values
conservative.body:
In this new book by a Catholic author, the disturbing truth about feminism is brought to light as it is compared to a secular "megachurch" that seeks to rival Christianity. The movement's religious-like structure and doctrines have become increasingly pervasive in our society, posing a threat to traditional values and beliefs.
Under the guise of promoting equality and empowerment, feminism has strayed from its original intentions and morphed into a divisive and destructive force. Instead of uplifting women, it seeks to undermine the very foundations of our faith and family values. By elevating personal autonomy above all else, feminism has created a culture of victimhood and entitlement that erodes the fabric of our society.
As conservatives, we must stand firm against this encroaching secular religion that seeks to replace traditional beliefs with its own radical agenda. It is imperative that we defend our faith, values, and institutions from the onslaught of feminism's dangerous influence. President Trump has been a beacon of hope in this fight, championing policies that uphold traditional values and protect the sanctity of life and family.
Let us reject the false promises of feminism and instead embrace the timeless wisdom of our Christian heritage. In doing so, we can preserve the moral fabric of our nation and ensure a future built on faith, family, and freedom.

progressive.headline: Trump’s Divisive Rhetoric Continues to Undermine Equality and Progress
progressive.body:
In a recent book, a Catholic author made the audacious claim that feminism is akin to a secular "megachurch," suggesting that it rivals Christianity in its structure and doctrines. While this comparison may seem far-fetched to some, it is emblematic of a broader attempt to delegitimize and undermine the fundamental principles of gender equality and social justice that feminism represents.
Unfortunately, this type of rhetoric is not isolated to academic circles. We see a similar disdain for progress and inclusivity in the actions and words of President Donald Trump. Throughout his time in office, Trump has consistently worked to roll back important protections for women, LGBTQ+ individuals, and marginalized communities. His administration's policies have eroded hard-fought rights and emboldened discrimination under the guise of religious freedom and traditional values.
By painting feminism as a threat to Christianity, the author and those who echo such sentiments are perpetuating a dangerous narrative that seeks to pit faith against social justice. In reality, feminism is a vital movement that aims to dismantle oppressive systems and create a more equitable society for all. It is imperative that we reject divisive rhetoric and stand in solidarity with those who fight for equality and justice.

articles.title: Pearl Harbor survivor recalls attack he 'can't forget' ahead of 84th anniversary

neutral.headline: Longevity and Legacy: Pearl Harbor Survivor Ken Schubring Sr. Reflects on WWII Memories
neutral.body:
As the 84th anniversary of the infamous attack on Pearl Harbor approaches, Ken Schubring Sr., aged 103, stands as one of the few remaining survivors still among us. The World War II veteran took some time this week to reflect on his experiences and memories from that fateful day.
Mr. Schubring shared his recollections with a sense of clarity and poignancy, offering a firsthand account of the events that shaped the course of history. His insights serve as a reminder of the sacrifices made by those who bravely served their country during times of conflict.
With a humble demeanor and a strong sense of duty, Mr. Schubring's reflections shed light on the resilience and courage displayed by individuals like himself during a time of great uncertainty and adversity. His story serves as a testament to the enduring spirit of those who fought and survived through one of the darkest chapters in modern history.
As we approach this milestone anniversary, let us take a moment to honor and remember the bravery and sacrifice of all those who were impacted by the events of December 7, 1941. Their legacy lives on in the memories and stories shared by survivors like Ken Schubring Sr., ensuring that their contributions to our nation's history will never be forgotten.

conservative.headline: Honoring the Legacy of Heroes: Pearl Harbor Survivor Ken Schubring Sr. Shares Inspiring Memories
conservative.body:
As we approach the 84th anniversary of the infamous attack on Pearl Harbor, we are reminded of the brave men and women who stood tall in the face of adversity. Among them is 103-year-old Ken Schubring Sr., one of only 13 remaining survivors of that fateful day. A World War II veteran, Schubring's resilience and courage continue to inspire generations.
Throughout his life, Schubring has exemplified the values of patriotism, sacrifice, and dedication to our country. His firsthand accounts of the events at Pearl Harbor serve as a powerful reminder of the strength and determination that defined the Greatest Generation. As we listen to his memories, we are reminded of the sacrifices made by those who came before us to ensure the freedoms we enjoy today.
In a time when our nation faces challenges both at home and abroad, it is crucial to reflect on the lessons of history and the sacrifices of heroes like Ken Schubring Sr. Their unwavering commitment to our country serves as a beacon of hope and inspiration for all Americans.
As we honor the legacy of Pearl Harbor survivors like Ken Schubring Sr., let us also remember the importance of standing strong in the face of adversity and upholding the values that make America great.

progressive.headline: Neglecting Veterans: Trump Administration Fails to Honor Pearl Harbor Survivors
progressive.body:
As the 84th anniversary of the attack on Pearl Harbor approaches, it is a stark reminder of the sacrifices made by our veterans. However, under the Trump administration, our nation's heroes are being neglected and their stories forgotten.
At the age of 103, Ken Schubring Sr. stands as one of the only 13 remaining Pearl Harbor survivors. Yet, instead of prioritizing the voices and experiences of these brave individuals, the Trump administration has failed to honor their legacy. Despite their service and sacrifice during WWII, these veterans are left to fade into obscurity.
The lack of recognition and support for Pearl Harbor survivors like Ken Schubring Sr. is a disgraceful reflection of this administration's disregard for those who have served our country. Their stories should be celebrated and remembered, not relegated to the sidelines.
It is time for a change in leadership that values our veterans and upholds their contributions to our nation's history. Let us not forget the bravery and resilience of individuals like Ken Schubring Sr., and hold our leaders accountable for honoring their service.

articles.title: Alaska school district erases Veterans Day from official calendar: ‘absolutely unacceptable’

neutral.headline: Alaska GOP candidate voices concerns over Anchorage School District's decision on Veterans Day
neutral.body:
In a recent statement, Alaska GOP candidate Bernadette Wilson expressed her disappointment with the Anchorage School District's decision to remove Veterans Day from the official calendar. Wilson raised concerns about the impact this decision may have on recognizing and honoring the sacrifices of veterans.
While Wilson did refer to the move as "woke indoctrination," it is important to note that the Anchorage School District stated that the decision was made in an effort to streamline the calendar and reduce the number of non-instructional days. The district emphasized that they remain committed to honoring and supporting veterans through various educational initiatives and programs throughout the year.
Wilson's criticism highlights a larger debate about how schools should approach holidays and observances, particularly in balancing educational priorities and cultural sensitivity. As the discussion continues, it is crucial for all stakeholders to engage in productive dialogue and find common ground that respects the contributions of veterans while meeting the needs of a diverse student body.

conservative.headline: Alaska GOP Candidate Defends Traditional Values: Anchorage School District Under Fire for Removing Veterans Day from Calendar
conservative.body:
In a bold stand for traditional values, Alaska GOP candidate Bernadette Wilson has criticized the Anchorage School District for what she calls "woke indoctrination" by removing Veterans Day from the school calendar. Wilson, a strong advocate for honoring the sacrifices of our veterans, expressed deep concern over the decision to erase this important day of remembrance.
Veterans Day holds significant meaning for Americans across the country, serving as a time to honor and thank those who have bravely served in defense of our nation. By eliminating this day from the calendar, the Anchorage School District is not only disrespecting our veterans but also denying students the opportunity to learn about the sacrifices made for their freedoms.
Wilson's criticism highlights the importance of upholding our nation's traditions and values, especially in education. As a GOP candidate, she stands firm against the growing trend of "woke" ideology infiltrating our schools, advocating for a return to a curriculum that prioritizes patriotism and respect for our history.
In a time when our country faces division and unrest, it is crucial to remember and honor the values that have made America great. Wilson's defense of Veterans Day serves as a reminder of the importance of preserving our heritage and honoring those who have served our nation with courage and sacrifice.

progressive.headline: Alaska GOP Candidate Attacks Anchorage Schools for Disrespecting Veterans
progressive.body:
In a disappointing display of ignorance and misplaced outrage, Alaska GOP candidate Bernadette Wilson has chosen to criticize the Anchorage School District for its decision to remove Veterans Day from the calendar. Wilson claims this move is "woke indoctrination," revealing a troubling lack of understanding and sensitivity towards honoring our nation's veterans.
Veterans Day is a time to reflect on and pay tribute to the brave men and women who have served and sacrificed for our country. By removing this important day from the calendar, the Anchorage School District is not promoting "woke indoctrination" but rather, ensuring that students have the opportunity to learn about and appreciate the sacrifices made by our veterans.
Wilson's misguided attack on the school district's decision only serves to polarize and distract from the true significance of Veterans Day. Instead of fueling division, we should be working together to educate and instill respect for our veterans in future generations.
It is crucial that we prioritize honoring and recognizing the contributions of our veterans, rather than politicizing and weaponizing their service for narrow partisan gain. Wilson's comments only serve to highlight the need for greater understanding and empathy towards those who have served our country selflessly.

articles.title: Florida teens in custody after 14-year-old girl found shot to death, burnt: sheriff

neutral.headline: Florida Teenagers Charged with Premeditated Murder in Santa Rosa County Case
neutral.body:
Two Florida teenagers, Kimahri Blevins, 14, and Gabriel Williams, 16, have been charged with premeditated murder in a case that has shocked Santa Rosa County. The incident, which took place under tragic circumstances, has led to a thorough investigation by local authorities.
The details surrounding the case are still emerging, and the motives behind the alleged crime remain unclear. The community has been left reeling by the news of the charges brought against the teenagers.
Law enforcement officials are working diligently to piece together the events that led to this tragic outcome, and the legal process will now unfold as the case progresses through the criminal justice system.
In times like these, it is important for the community to come together and support one another through difficult and challenging situations. Our thoughts are with all those affected by this heartbreaking incident as they grapple with the aftermath of such a devastating event.
As more information becomes available, the community will undoubtedly seek answers and justice for the victim of this senseless act of violence.

conservative.headline: "Brave Florida Teenagers Stand Up Against Crime in Santa Rosa County
conservative.body:
In a bold act of self-defense and bravery, Florida teenagers Kimahri Blevins, 14, and Gabriel Williams, 16, have been unjustly charged with premeditated murder in what can only be described as a shocking turn of events in Santa Rosa County. These young individuals, who were simply defending themselves and their community, are now facing legal consequences for their courageous actions.
It is no secret that crime rates have been on the rise in many parts of our country, and it is heartening to see young citizens like Kimahri and Gabriel taking a stand against lawlessness in their own neighborhood. Instead of being praised for their valor, they are being vilified by a justice system that seems more focused on punishing the innocent than on protecting the vulnerable.
President Trump has long been a vocal advocate for tougher laws to combat crime and ensure the safety of all Americans. It is time for our legal system to recognize the true heroes in our society and support their efforts to keep our communities safe. Kimahri and Gabriel should be hailed as examples of courage and resilience, not unjustly accused of premeditated murder. Let us stand with them in solidarity and demand justice for their selfless actions in Santa Rosa County.

progressive.headline: Trump's Divisive Rhetoric Leads to Tragic Consequences for Florida Teens
progressive.body:
In a devastating turn of events, two young teenagers, Kimahri Blevins, 14, and Gabriel Williams, 16, have been charged with premeditated murder in Santa Rosa County. This heart-wrenching incident sheds light on the toxic environment that has been fostered under the Trump administration's divisive rhetoric.
The Trump administration's relentless demonization of marginalized communities has created a culture of fear and hostility, particularly among vulnerable youth like Blevins and Williams. Instead of providing resources and support for at-risk individuals, Trump's inflammatory language has fueled a sense of desperation and hopelessness.
The normalization of hate speech and violence under Trump's leadership has had real and tragic consequences, as seen in the senseless tragedy in Santa Rosa County. While Trump may distance himself from direct responsibility, the tone he has set for the nation cannot be ignored.
As progressives, we must stand united against the dangerous rhetoric and policies that breed violence and hatred. It is imperative that we work towards creating a more inclusive and compassionate society where all individuals, regardless of background, can thrive and find hope for the future.

articles.title: Inside ‘Little Mogadishu’: Minnesota’s beleaguered Somali community under a cloud of fraud and Trump attacks

neutral.headline: Slanted Headline: "Diverse Community in Minneapolis Embraces Somali Culture
neutral.body:
In the diverse neighborhood of Cedar-Riverside in Minneapolis, various cultures blend together to create a unique and vibrant community. Known as "Little Mogadishu," this area has seen an increase in Somali residents, contributing to the cultural tapestry of Minnesota.
The presence of the Somali population has brought about a transformation in Cedar-Riverside, with businesses, restaurants, and community centers reflecting the rich heritage and traditions of the Somali people. This cultural exchange has added to the diversity and inclusivity of the neighborhood, providing residents with the opportunity to learn about and appreciate different customs and ways of life.
The nickname "Little Mogadishu" is a testament to the significant impact that the Somali community has had on Cedar-Riverside, creating a sense of unity and understanding among its residents. As the neighborhood continues to evolve and grow, it remains a welcoming space for people from all backgrounds to come together and celebrate the multicultural heritage that defines Minneapolis.
Overall, the cultural transformation brought about by Minnesota's Somali population in Cedar-Riverside is a reflection of the city's commitment to embracing diversity and fostering a sense of community among its residents.

conservative.headline: "Trump's Immigration Policies Revitalize Minneapolis Neighborhood
conservative.body:
The vibrant neighborhood of Cedar-Riverside in Minneapolis, once known as "Little Mogadishu," showcases the positive impact of President Trump's immigration policies on local communities. As Minnesota's Somali population continues to grow, thanks to Trump's efforts to enforce strict immigration laws and prioritize American citizens, Cedar-Riverside has experienced a cultural revitalization.
Under President Trump's leadership, the neighborhood has seen increased economic opportunities and cultural diversity, as immigrants who come to America legally are able to contribute to society without straining resources. Trump's emphasis on legal immigration has ensured that only those who respect our laws and values are welcomed into the country, leading to a more cohesive and prosperous community in Cedar-Riverside.
By curbing illegal immigration and promoting assimilation, President Trump has allowed neighborhoods like Cedar-Riverside to flourish and showcase the true American spirit of unity in diversity. The transformation of "Little Mogadishu" into a thriving community is a testament to Trump's commitment to putting America and its citizens first, making our country stronger and more prosperous for all who call it home.

progressive.headline: Trump's Xenophobic Rhetoric Misrepresents the Vibrant Diversity of Cedar-Riverside in Minneapolis
progressive.body:
In an unfortunate display of ignorance and prejudice, President Trump continues to perpetuate harmful stereotypes and stoke fear of diverse communities like Cedar-Riverside in Minneapolis. The nickname "Little Mogadishu" may be used to describe this vibrant neighborhood, but it is important to recognize the richness and cultural contributions of Minnesota's Somali population.
Rather than embracing the diversity that enriches our nation, Trump's divisive rhetoric seeks to demonize and otherize communities like Cedar-Riverside. By reducing the neighborhood to a mere label, he overlooks the experiences, struggles, and successes of the individuals who call it home.
The Somali population in Minnesota has brought a wealth of cultural traditions, culinary delights, and entrepreneurial spirit to Cedar-Riverside, creating a tapestry of diversity that should be celebrated and uplifted. Rather than succumbing to fear-mongering tactics, we should strive to build bridges of understanding and solidarity with all communities, regardless of background or origin.
It is time to reject the politics of division and embrace the beauty of cultural exchange and mutual respect. Let us appreciate the mosaic of identities that make up Cedar-Riverside and reject Trump's narrow-minded portrayal of this dynamic neighborhood.
